free: #e There was tribe man. He was very busy with his field work.
#c 有一個部落的人，他非常忙碌於他的耕作。
#e The tree that he grew had borne fruits.
#e He was busy picking the fruits.
#e Although he was very old, he still climbed onto the tree and picked his fruits one by one.
#c 雖說他的年紀很大了，他還是爬上樹去，一個一個地採擷他果樹的果實。
#e There was another busy person. He pulled his goat and passed there.
#c 另外一個人也非常忙碌，牽著他的羊經過了那裡。
#e They did not talk to each other because they were busying doing their own work.
#c 他們沒有互相交談，因為他們忙著做自己部落裡的工作。
#e This old man finished his job and gathered three baskets of fruits.
#c 沒多久，這位老人家就完成了三個籃子的採集工作。
#e His child came back from school by bicycle.
#c 他的孩子騎著車從學校回來（放學）了。
#e He saw three baskets of fruits that his grandpa gathered.
#c 他看到他的爺爺採的三個籃子的果實。
#e And out of care, he helped his grandpa to take a basket of fruits.
#c 然後他疼惜他的爺爺, 所以幫忙提了一個籃子的果實。
#e He helped his grandpa take the basket home.
#c 他幫忙他的爺爺搬運回家。
#e And his grandpa concentrated on picking fruits and did not know that.
#c 而他的爺爺卻專心一直採著果實，一點都不知道。
#e And the child rushed to take that basket of fruits, and did not know it at all.
#c 而那個孩子也急著帶著那一籃的果實，也完全不知道。
#e And then, his grandson rode his bike and left.
#c 接著，他孫子騎著車離開。
#e (He) met a person in the same tribe who also rode a bike.
#c 迎面來了一位同村的人，一樣騎著車。
#e This boy looked at a girl and then his hat flew away.
#c 這個男孩看著一個女孩，然後他的帽子就飛走了。
#e As he bumped into a stone and fell down, the fruits were scattered on the ground.
#c 也因為碰到了石頭而跌倒，爺爺採的果實也全散落在地。
#e His foot seemed to hurt and he felt like crying; he picked up the fruits one by one.
#c 看起來他的腳很痛，也想哭；他一個一個的撿著果實。
#e At the same time, children in the tribe also passed there.
#c 同時部落裡的孩子們也從那裡經過。
#e Those children in the same tribe saw him fall down. They felt sorry for him and helped him pick up the fruits on
#c 同部落的小孩看到他跌倒，就同情他，幫他撿起地上掉落的果實。這樣互相幫忙真的很好。
#n 'taqi heya taqi uh--' This part does not fit into translation. 為語誤,與本句語意無關,故不翻出。
#e After picking all the fruits up, he walked with his bike. He felt like crying because his foot hurt.
#c 撿完果實之後，他牽著車走著，他的腳感覺真的痛而想哭。
#e But he heard the children from the same tribe calling him, and they gave him his hat. Out of gratitude, he gave these children three fruits.
#c 卻聽到同村的孩子喊著他，並送來他掉落的帽子，他感動的拿了三個果實給這些小孩。
#e Before long, the children passed by the place where the old man gathered the fruits.
#c 不久之後,孩子們經過採集果實處。
#e The old man saw the gathered fruits and thought, "How come there is one (basket) missing?". He counted and thought ""Where has it gone?".
#c 老先生看著他所採的果實「怎麼少了一個呢?」，他這樣想著並數著「去了哪兒呢?」
#e The children didn't know what happened and passed by.
#c 小孩子完全不知情的經過那裡。
#e The old man thought, "Do I not have three baskets of fruits? Where is the missing one ? Is it that in fact I have only two baskets?".
#c 老爺爺想著，「我們採的果實一籃去了哪呢？不是三個嗎？還是只有兩個？」他這位爺爺不停的想著。
